title: Ann the Word: The Story of Ann Lee, Female Messiah, Mother of the Shakers, The Woman Clothed with the Sun
description: The author of Fat Hen and Transcendental Utopias offers an intriguing, definitive portrait of Ann Lee, the charismatic woman who became the founder of the Shakers, from her rise from humble English origins to become a visionary religious leader who transformed religious faith. Reprint.
author: Richard Francis
